verses.verse: And there was a man<WH376> of mount<WH2022> Ephraim,<WH669> whose name<WH8034> was Micah.<WH4319>

And he said<WH559> to his mother,<WH517> The eleven<WH505> <WH3967> hundred<WH3967> shekels of silver<WH3701> that were taken<WH3947> from you, about which you cursed,<WH422> and spoke<WH559> of also<WH1571> in my ears,<WH241> behold,<WH2009> the silver<WH3701> is with me; I took<WH3947> it. And his mother<WH517> said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be you of the LORD,<WH3068> my son.<WH1121>

And when he had restored<WH7725> the eleven<WH505> <WH3967> hundred<WH3967> shekels of silver<WH3701> to his mother,<WH517> his mother<WH517> said,<WH559> I had wholly<WH6942> dedicated<WH6942> the silver<WH3701> to the LORD<WH3068> from my hand<WH3027> for my son,<WH1121> to make<WH6213> a graven<WH6459> image and a molten<WH4541> image: now<WH6258> therefore I will restore<WH7725> it to you.

Yet he restored<WH7725> the money<WH3701> to his mother;<WH517> and his mother<WH517> took<WH3947> two hundred<WH3967> shekels of silver,<WH3701> and gave<WH5414> them to the founder,<WH6884> who made<WH6213> thereof a graven<WH6459> image and a molten<WH4541> image: and they were in the house<WH1004> of Micah.<WH4319>

And the man<WH376> Micah<WH4318> had an house<WH1004> of gods,<WH430> and made<WH6213> an ephod,<WH646> and teraphim,<WH8655> and consecrated<WH4390> <WH3027> one<WH259> of his sons,<WH1121> who became<WH1961> his priest.<WH3548>
In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> there was no<WH369> king<WH4428> in Israel,<WH3478> but every man<WH376> did<WH6213> that which was right<WH3477> in his own eyes.<WH5869>
And there was a young<WH5288> man out of Bethlehemjudah<WH1035> of the family<WH4940> of Judah,<WH3063> who<WH1931> was a Levite,<WH3881> and he sojourned<WH1481> there.<WH8033>

And the man<WH376> departed<WH3212> out of the city<WH5892> from Bethlehemjudah<WH1035> to sojourn<WH1481> where<WH834> he could find<WH4672> a place: and he came<WH935> to mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669> to the house<WH1004> of Micah,<WH4318> as he journeyed.<WH6213> <WH1870>

And Micah<WH4319> said<WH559> to him, From where<WH370> come<WH935> you? And he said<WH559> to him, I am a Levite<WH3881> of Bethlehemjudah,<WH1035> and I go<WH1980> to sojourn<WH1481> where<WH834> I may find<WH4672> a place.

And Micah<WH4319> said<WH559> to him, Dwell<WH3427> with me, and be to me a father<WH1> and a priest,<WH3548> and I will give<WH5414> you ten<WH6235> shekels of silver<WH3701> by the year,<WH3117> and a suit<WH6187> of apparel,<WH899> and your victuals.<WH4241> So the Levite<WH3881> went<WH3212> in.
And the Levite<WH3881> was content<WH2974> to dwell<WH3427> with the man;<WH376> and the young<WH5288> man was to him as one<WH259> of his sons.<WH1121>
And Micah<WH4318> consecrated<WH3027> the Levite;<WH3881> and the young<WH5288> man became<WH1961> his priest,<WH3548> and was in the house<WH1004> of Micah.<WH4318>
Then said<WH559> Micah,<WH4318> Now<WH6258> know<WH3045> I that the LORD<WH3068> will do me good,<WH3190> seeing<WH3588> I have<WH1961> a Levite<WH3881> to my priest.<WH3548>
